easy.q: I fly without wings and I cry without eyes. What am I?
easy.hint: Up in the sky, it can sprinkle or thunder.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be.
medium.hint: Think about how the count changes when you add letters.

hard.q: In a room there are 3 switches and 3 lamps outside the room. You can flip switches any way but can only enter the room once. How can you tell which switch controls which lamp?
hard.a: Turn on two switches, wait, turn one off, then enter to see which lamp is off and which is on; use the heat of the bulbs for the remaining mapping.
hard.hint: Consider power, heat, and timing to distinguish.
